title: Serious Bug! Please up vote!
body:
Only noticed it this week that randomly while playing in the middle of a match, the game will crash and freeze up my pc! when this happens i am unable to do anything on my pc! i tried to Alt+tab but it gets stuck on the frozen game screen, Win+tab works but when i click on another window it jsut goes back to the game screen, While in Win+tab view i can see an error message saying
 "A critical error has occurred and the process must be terminated. 
Would you like to create a crash dump for the developers in troubleshooting this error? This may take up to 5 minutes. 
NOTE : The process may appear unresponsive during this time".

The only way i have been able to fix this is by restarting my pc!

Ticket will be getting submitted but i just want to do my best to make developers aware of this issue to get it fixed before to many others get hit with it.
If you've had it happen to you or a friend please leave a comment just so i know it not just my pc.
Thank you!
